submission:
from sortedcontainers import SortedList

class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        sumv = SortedList()
        diffv = SortedList()
        for x, y in points:
            sumv.add(x + y)
            diffv.add(x - y)
        ans = inf
        for x, y in points:
            sumv.remove(x + y)
            diffv.remove(x - y)
            ans = min(ans, max(sumv[-1] - sumv[0], diffv[-1] - diffv[0]))
            sumv.add(x + y)
            diffv.add(x - y)
        return ans
